About Me

I am an upcoming Computer Science professional with a master’s degree from CSU Dominguez Hills. I have gained working experience in software development, Project Management and Customer Facing experience from my academic and working experience. I am strong, confident, adaptable and have plenty of theoretical and practical experience in the field with a strong desire to prove my credential and values given a chance.

Projects and Academic Experiance

Handwriting Recognition for numbers in Roman Script

Github Link

Created the project as a way to learn TensorFlow , Keras and GitHub

Developed an ML and Artificial Neural Network powered handwriting detection system using TensorFlow Framework and Keras Backend to enable handwriting recognition with 99% accuracy.

IMDB - Movie Review sentiment analyser

Github Link

Created the project as a way to learn PyTorch , Pandas and TensorFlow

Developed a TensorFlow and Keras(Backend) powered sentiment analyzer that can detect if the review left for a particular movie is good or bad based on the terms used in the Review. It uses Word Embedding for the mapping.

Real-Time Object Detection using YOLO v3

Created the project as a way to learn YOLOv3 , Object Detection and Machine Learning

Developed an ML and Artificial Neural Network powered handwriting detection system using TensorFlow Framework and Keras Backend to enable handwriting recognition with 99% accuracy.

Asynchronous Cryptography based Inter-Vehicular Ad-Hoc Message Authentication

Created the project as a way to learn Cryptography , Message Authentication and Ad-Hoc Networks

Worked on a research project based on using asynchronous methods to authenticate messages being passed between various vehicles and posts appointed at the roads for guidence and updates.

Lwitter - Twitter Client using Twitter API (IOS Application)

Github Link

Created the project as a way to learn IOS Development , XCODE , AlamoFire ,RestFUL API and SWIFT 5

Built on Xcode 12, AlamoFire and Twitter Official API to build a twitter Client that can serve as the main twitter client for users.

Improving Sentiment Analysis by Introducing Emotion Detection

Project developed for the compleation of my Master's project using PyTorch, BERT and Multiple Classifiers

Developed a TensorFlow and Keras(Backend) powered sentiment analyzer that can detect if the review left for a particular movie is good or bad based on the terms used in the Review. It uses Word Embedding for the mapping.
